headline: Colgate-Palmolive (NYSE:CL) Announces US$5000 Million Buyback As Stock Stays Flat
summary: Colgate-Palmolive (NYSE:CL) recently announced the authorization of a $5 billion share repurchase program, reflecting the company's effort to increase shareholder value. This development coincided with improved market sentiment, with the S&P 500 potentially breaking a four-week losing spell. Despite broader economic uncertainty highlighted by the Federal Reserve's steady interest rates, Colgate-Palmolive's stock rose 4.5% last month. This positive movement aligns with a general market upturn...

headline: Should You Invest in Colgate-Palmolive Company (CL)?
summary: Diamond Hill Capital, an investment management company, released its “Large Cap Strategy” fourth-quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Despite inconsistent Q4 gains, markets ended the year positively. The portfolio trailed the Russell 1000 Index benchmark in Q4 and 2024. In Q4, the strategy returned -2.27% (net) vs 2.75% […]
